name: mud-sport
effect: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.
